item.title: Yaka Campsite Review
item.author: Hong
item.description: This is my 6th camping trip, first one outside of Johor. I decided to celebrate Christmas at Yaka Campsite. I love this campsite and will definitely visit it again, but not during rainy season.

item.title: Back to Nature Again
item.author: Hong
item.description: This is my 5th camping trip, Back To Nature again. It is my first group camping, previously it was just me and my wife. This time with colleagues.

item.title: 木后 Campsite Review
item.author: Hong
item.description: This is my 4th camping trip. It is a new campsite that is not publicly announced yet. This campsite is currently under trial run and undergoing improvements. I get to know this secretive place from a Facebook post.

item.title: Sunrise Camp Review
item.author: Hong
item.description: Sunrise camp is a popular campsite among Johoreans. It is located in Bandar Penawar, Desaru, Johor. It seems all 3 campsites (including this trip) that I have visited are all at the beach.

item.title: Back To Nature Campsite Review
item.author: Hong
item.description: Right after TBC, I visited Back To Nature on 15th September 2023. BTN is located in Mersing, 2 hr 13 min (153 KM) drive from Johor Bahru. This is the second stop of my campsite hopping trip, here goes the review …

item.title: Tiger Base Camp Review
item.author: Hong
item.description: I went campsite hopping on 14th and 15th September 2023. Visited Tiger Base Camp on the first day and Back To Nature on the second day. This is my review for TBC.

item.title: Frustrated With Mistakes
item.author: Hong
item.description: While I was practicing dancing last night, I was frustrated with making basic mistakes. The continuous swing movement from beat 2 to 3 in Waltz, body moving forward while stepping forward. These are basics, but I was not doing it well. This frustrates me, as I was thinking an advanced dancers should not be making such mistakes.

item.title: Using Your Strength in Dancing
item.author: Hong
item.description: After the competition, my teacher said that I was not using my full strength in dancing. I got defensive, and get the impression that he was assuming that I wasn’t doing my best in the competition. It took me some time to realize that doing your best and being able to exert full strength are 2 different things.

item.title: Wilayah Open Dance Championship 2022
item.author: Hong
item.description: Attended Wilayah Open Dance Championship 2020, organised by Amy Lee (Amy Dancesport Centre) on 10 July 2022. This is the first time I attend a physical competition since COVID lockdown in Malaysia.

item.title: Dance Etiquette
item.author: Hong
item.description: Because there are multiple people on the dance floor, dance etiquette helps to ensure that everyone has a good time. This applies to lesson time, practise sessions, and dance parties.
